text: Extreme is an American rock band. They are headed by frontmen Gary Cherone and Nuno Bettencourt. They were popular in the late 1980s and early 1990s. Among some of Extreme's musical influences are Aerosmith, Led Zeppelin, Queen. Extreme had their greatest success with their 1990 album Pornograffitti. It peaked at number 10 on the Billboard 200.
